body:
# # Her Flame

**She rose from ash and fuck and fire.**

_Lips like lit scripture,_

> “This is your altar now.”

- Lust  
- Lineage  
- Love  

[Return to the Bloodroom](http://localhost:3000/vault)

🩸🔥👑
